content.rendered:
Congratulations to the following staff who were recognized at the June 9, 2022 tenure reception:

  • Administrative: Cody Conley, Dr. Joseph Greco, Courtney Jablonski, Michelle Tsao, and Michele Whitley
  • Division Street: Kayla Ferraro, Michelle Law, Shauna Otsu-Schechner, Melissa Brown, and Rachel Sturm
  • Dorothy Nolan: Katie Cloutier, Bryan Geary, Jessica Guelcher, Carrie Jackson, and Kelly Rogers
  • Geyser Road: Magaly Barreto
  • Greenfield: Caroline Godino, Nicole Sano, Kathleen Shambo, and Lynne McGee.
  • Lake Avenue: Julie Roberts
  • Maple Avenue: Amy Fehringer, Jennifer Kelly, Kristen Phelps, Angela Tolan, and Stephen Horton
  • High School: Kendra Astemborski, Adam Cox, Marion Gyarmathy, Kathleen Hannan, Nichole Mantas, Heather Neddo, Colleen Sanita, Sharon MacNeil, and Lisette Aviles Wachtel
